code: import api from'./api';export const uploadService={uploadImage:async file=>{try{const formData=new FormData();formData.append('image',file);const response=await api.post('/upload/image',formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Error uploading image:',error);throw error;}},uploadMultipleImages:async files=>{try{const formData=new FormData();files.forEach(file=>{formData.append('images',file);});const response=await api.post('/upload/images',formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Error uploading images:',error);throw error;}}};
